title: DLOG_STRING Function Module
description:
DLOG_STRING is for logging (recording) of a process value of type DINT, 

and can only be used in combination with a DLOG_STORE_* module, as this 

coordinates of the data structure X to record the data. At recording formats that 

support a process value name, such as at DLOG_STORE_FILE_CSV a name can be 

provided at COLUMN".
name: DLOG_STRING

input.name: STR
input.description: The string representation of the process value to be logged.

input.name: COLUMN
input.description: The name of the process value for logging purposes.

in/out.name: X
in/out.description: The DLOG data structure used for recording.
